languages.text: "Арбитес понесли потери, и это не упрощает выбор. Пост должен занять достойный, а не вынужденная кандидатура".

traits.locale_text: "Арбитес понесли потери, и это не упрощает выбор. Пост должен занять достойный, а не вынужденная кандидатура".

languages.text: "The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."
languages.original_text: "Арбитес понесли потери, и это не упрощает выбор. Пост должен занять достойный, а не вынужденная кандидатура".

traits.locale_text: "The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."
"The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."
"The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."
"The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."
"The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."
"The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."

languages.text: 「確かに高等裁定局は損失を被りました。ですが、だからといって後任選びが容易になるわけではありません。選定は、必要に迫られてではなく、あくまで実力に基づいて行われなければなりません」
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに高等裁定局は損失を被りました。ですが、だからといって後任選びが容易になるわけではありません。選定は、必要に迫られてではなく、あくまで実力に基づいて行われなければなりません」

languages.text: "Der Adeptus Arbites hat in der Tat Verluste erlitten, aber das macht es nicht leichter, einen Ersatz zu finden. Die Wahl muss auf Eignung basieren, nicht auf Notwendigkeit."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."

traits.locale_text: "Der Adeptus Arbites hat in der Tat Verluste erlitten, aber das macht es nicht leichter, einen Ersatz zu finden. Die Wahl muss auf Eignung basieren, nicht auf Notwendigkeit."

languages.text: « L'Adeptus Arbites a effectivement subi des pertes, mais il n'est pas plus facile de trouver un remplaçant pour autant. Le choix doit être fait en fonction du mérite, pas de la nécessité. »
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."

traits.locale_text: « L'Adeptus Arbites a effectivement subi des pertes, mais il n'est pas plus facile de trouver un remplaçant pour autant. Le choix doit être fait en fonction du mérite, pas de la nécessité. »

languages.text: «El Adeptus Arbites ha sufrido pérdidas, pero no por ello será más fácil encontrar un sustituto. El nombramiento debe basarse en el mérito, no en la necesidad».
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."

traits.locale_text: «El Adeptus Arbites ha sufrido pérdidas, pero no por ello será más fácil encontrar un sustituto. El nombramiento debe basarse en el mérito, no en la necesidad».

languages.text: “法务部确实承受了相当程度的损失，但即便如此，对元帅的标准也不会降低。只有合适的人才能当元帅，我们并不是非要选出一位元帅不可。”
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."

traits.locale_text: “法务部确实承受了相当程度的损失，但即便如此，对元帅的标准也不会降低。只有合适的人才能当元帅，我们并不是非要选出一位元帅不可。”

languages.text: "Adeptus Arbites'in kayba uğradığı aşikâr ancak boşalan mevki kolay dolmayacak. Gereklilikten değil, liyakat usulünce seçim yapılmalı."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Arbites'in kayba uğradığı aşikâr ancak boşalan mevki kolay dolmayacak. Seçim gereklilikten değil, liyakat usulünce yapılmalı."

languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Arbites has indeed sustained losses, but that does not make it any easier to find a replacement. The choice must be made based on merit, not out of necessity."
